metadata.synopsis: Clicking on one of the plaquet at the central square in Town for the first time. The plaques must be pressed in the right order to unlock a secret room, and have what looks like nonsense written on them, but is actually the clue to the order.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go to the central square (SCL_Main_A -148.473; 28.635; -33.935)Click on one of the plaques.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Was that a click I heard? There's something about these plaques...
